price: A oni kojima smo još prije lijepu nagradu obećali, oni će od njega daleko biti.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتۡ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَنۡهَا مُبۡعَدُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna sabaqat lahum minnā al-ḥus'nā ulāika ʿanhā mub'ʿadūna
